aka: Raiders of the Lost Art – Die Kunstjäger
this_title: Raiders of the Lost Art Season 2
trans_title: Raiders of the Lost Art – Die Kunstjäger
introduction: An investigation into the fate of vanished masterpieces throughout history. Through dramatic reenactments, rare archival footage, and expert insights, viewers learn how these treasures were looted, stolen, or lost to time. While some works have been recovered, many remain elusive, leaving their stories unfinished and inviting speculation about their current whereabouts.S2 E1 Stealing the ScreamS2 E2 Klimt Gustav's GoldS2 E3 The Many Faces of RembrandtS2 E4 El Greco Lost in TimeS2 E5 The Lessons of LeonardoS2 E6 The Elusive van EyckS2 E7 Van Gogh's Seven SunflowersS2 E8 Monet First ImpressionsS2 E9 Vermeer Lost Pearl Of DelftS2 E10 Capturing CezanneS2 E11 Turner Leading LightS2 E12 Raphael The Relentless
chinese_title: Raiders of the Lost Art Season 2
